content: अनुमतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Permission, consent, approval, assent. {@--2@} The 15th day of the moon's age on which she rises one digit less than full, when the gods and manes receive oblations with favour; personified as a goddess or worshipped in the Rājasūya sacrifice (कलाहीनचंद्रवती शुक्लचतुर्दशीयुतपूर्णिमातिथिः); अनुमत्यै हविरष्टाकपालं पुरोडाश निर्वपति <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 86-87</ls>.
